chart.title: Timeline of User Activity
chart.searchString: index=dynatrace sourcetype="pa" | timechart count by "dimensions.User Action Source Page Title" limit=10

table.title: Detail User Actions
table.searchString: index=dynatrace (sourcetype="pa" OR sourcetype="visit") | spath "dimensions.Apdex performance zone for User Actions" output=appdex_val | search appdex_val="satisfied" | spath "url" | spath "application" | spath "actionName" | rex field=url "(?<site>(?:http://)(?:[a-zA-Z_-]+\.){1,}\w+(?::\d+))\/" | rex field=url "^(?:http://)(?:[a-zA-Z_-]+\.){1,}\w+(?::\d+)\/(?<page_name>[a-zA-Z\._-]+)(?:/|\?|=|\s|$)" | rex field=url "^(?:http://)(?:[a-zA-Z_-]+\.){1,}\w+(?::\d+)\/[a-zA-Z\._-]+(?:/|\?|=|\s|$)(?<page_action>[a-zA-Z_-]+)" | fields "dimensions.User Action Source Page Title" "dimensions.Country of Visits" appdex_val url site page_name page_action actionName visitId application | stats list(url) AS URL list("dimensions.Country of Visits") AS Country list("dimensions.User Action Source Page Title") AS PageName by visitId application
